SEARCH
程序包 src.main.java.card_management_story12

类 BankCardController

java.lang.Object
src.main.java.card_management_story12.BankCardController
public class BankCardController extends Object
Title : BankCardController.java Description: Controller for the bank card management view (Story 12). It handles card entry validation, displays success GIF, shows saved cards in a table, and manages navigation back to the main menu or entry form. Uses CSVUtils for persistence.

    Displays an error alert with the specified message.

    Displays the success GIF for 4.5 seconds, then returns to the entry form.

    Validates the card input fields: 16-digit number, full name, MM/YY expiry format, and 3-digit CVV.

      public BankCardController()

  • 方法详细资料

    • initialize

      public void initialize()
      Initializes the controller after FXML injection. Sets up the background image, loads saved cards into the table, and configures the table columns.

    • setupBackground

      private void setupBackground()
      Loads and applies the background image; falls back to a light gray fill on error.

    • loadTableData

      private void loadTableData()
      Loads saved credit cards from CSV using CSVUtils into the table's data list.

    • configTableColumns

      private void configTableColumns()
      Configures each table column's preferred width based on its header text.

    • handleBackToCardEntry

      private void handleBackToCardEntry()
      Returns from the GIF view back to the card entry form.

    • handleAddCard

      private void handleAddCard()
      Validates input fields and, on success, saves a new card, clears the fields, and shows a confirmation GIF.

    • showGifView

      private void showGifView()
      Displays the success GIF for 4.5 seconds, then returns to the entry form.

    • returnToPreviousPage

      public void returnToPreviousPage()
      Returns from the GIF view to the card entry form. Made public for potential external calls.

    • handleShowCards

      private void handleShowCards()
      Shows the saved cards table view.

    • handleReturn

      private void handleReturn()
      Returns from the table view to the card entry form.

    • handleBackToMain

      private void handleBackToMain()
      Closes this window and returns to the main menu.

    • validateInput

      private boolean validateInput(String cardNumber, String cardHolder, String expiryDate, String cvv)
      Validates the card input fields: 16-digit number, full name, MM/YY expiry format, and 3-digit CVV. Shows an error alert on failure.
      参数:
      cardNumber - the card number text
      cardHolder - the card holder name
      expiryDate - the expiry date text
      cvv - the CVV text
      返回:
      true if all inputs are valid; false otherwise

    • clearFields

      private void clearFields()
      Clears all input fields in the card entry form.

    • showError

      private void showError(String message)
      Displays an error alert with the specified message.
      参数:
      message - the error message to show
